info.title: VZP NIS: CSC integration API
info.description: VZP NIS: CSC integration API (Centralni sprava ciselniku)

get.description:
Without query parameters, it returns list of codelists valid at curent time.

Parameters id, usr and time are filters limiting data we want to retrieve.

usr is user filter. If set to ID of user (GUID), function limits result to versions and drafts, 
where user has role of editor or garant.

id limits result to single code list ID. If not used, all codelists are returned.
This may be usefull when you need stats of just one code list, or, with combination with time=all parameter,
you can list all versions of one code list.

By time we say that we want to see code lists data which was applying at the given moment.
If it is not set, code lists valid at current time are returned.
It also supports value "all". In that case function returs all versions of code list(s)
Otherwise the value must be string parseable into date-time format (ideally date in ISO format)

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time we want version valid at

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Limit to single code list ID

Otherwise returns current version, applying at this moment.

post.description:
Unpublishes version of codelist and makes it draft with state "editing".
Only versions applying in future can be unpublished. Current version or past versions must remain
unchanged and unpublishing is not possible.

post.description:
Draft, má-li být vypublikován, musí vyhovět následujícím validacím:        
- Validace dat (obsahu). 
    - Obsah nesmí být prázdný. Tzn. ve struktuře musí být definováno alespoň jedno pole (sloupec) a data musí obsahovat alespoň jeden řádek.
    - Data (drafts/{id}/data) můsí odpovídat nastavením sloupce, definovaným ve struktuře (drafts/{id}/structure). Datový typ, validace atd.
- Začátek platnosti (pole "validFrom") nesmí být v minulosti.
- Má-li draft kód ("code" != null), nesmí po dobu jeho platnosti být v platnosti i jiná verze jiného číselníku se stejným kódem.
